title: Schwartz and McMenamin
description:
Zach and ESPN's Michael Schwartz break down the red-hot Suns ahead of their showdown with the Warriors, then ESPN's Dave McMenamin checks in on the Lakers -- plus reaction to surgeries for Michael Porter Jr. and Joe Harris, and Knicks lineup tinkering. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
